text:
[Verse]
Stars in the sky tonight so bright
Holding dreams with all their light
Whispers soft under moon's eye
Shooting across the velvet high

[Verse 2]
Wishing upon a comet's trail
Hoping hearts they will prevail
In the glow of night we sail
Through the night we won't fail

[Chorus]
Stars in the sky
Gleaming up so high
Stars in the sky
Light up your eye

[Bridge]
Every twinkle a little spark
Guiding us out from the dark
No more shadows no more stark
In this night we make our mark

[Verse 3]
Catch a falling star's gleam
Hold it close make it your dream
Bright as day it will seem
In the night sky's beam

[Chorus]
Stars in the sky
Gleaming up so high
Stars in the sky
Light up your eye
title: Stars in the Sky
